game.name: Butterfly 2
game.shortDescription: The second part of the platformer-puzzle game about caterpillar's adventure. You can't jump, so you need to bounce off enemies or use tubes to your advantage. Both platformer skills and logic are required to complete 40 challenging levels!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The second part of the platformer-puzzle game about caterpillar's adventure. You can't jump, so you need to bounce off enemies or use tubes to your advantage. Both platformer skills and logic are required to complete 40 challenging levels!
